Texts.Chs: 把^orange;捣碎的水果^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;mashed fruits^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 让我们来制作下一种饮料需要的材料吧！你需要把^orange;苹果、梨、葡萄和桃子^white;统统捣碎。
Texts.Eng: Let's get what we need for our next beverage. Mash some ^orange;apples, pears, grapes and peaches^white;.

Texts.Chs: 现在让我们再加把劲！你需要做得更出色！
Texts.Eng: Now let's move on to something a little harder. Something with some oomph!
